alert.note: Alert for Benton (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 12:36AM PST until December 20 at 4:05PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oregon... Marys River near Philomath affecting Benton County. For the Willamette River Tributaries...including Philomath...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marys River near Philomath. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 20.0 feet, expect widespread lowland and agricultural flooding. Numerous roads along the Marys are affected, and some structures near the river may begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 AM PST Monday the stage was 19.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning. It will then fall below flood stage towards Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 1000 AM PST.
